attributes.action: Invite Donald Trump to the UK as early as possible to improve relations
attributes.additional_details: The new president has started an important movement against the corruption of the establishment. We can both criticise and compliment him but most importantly we must try our best as a country to maintain a healthy relationship with him and his country.
attributes.background: After brexit, trade and good relations between the United States of America and the United Kingdom are now of extreme importance.
